Text: Enron KidsKevin Here is what I have The only other thing I can think of is the pictures Do you know if we have a date for that yet You may want to ask Geneva before you leave today Thanks Lesli

ValeroCan you please forward to me a copy of this assignment If not would you please forward this to the correct person or let me know who to contact Thanks Lesli Forwarded by Lesli CampbellHOUECT on AM From Tanya Rohauer PM To Lesli CT cc Subject Valero Valero Gas Marketing LP assigned its master swap contract to Valero Marketing Supply before its merger with PGE according to legal CAS does not reflect the assignment it shows that the master is still with Valero Gas Marketing which is now PGE Texas VGM Can you get a copy of the assignment from Tana Jones and get the master moved within credit aggregation the trades are in the right place Thanks Tanya

ValeroIm sorry but I cant remember if Ive already asked you for this documentation or not I have not received anything and would like to get this resolved Please let me know if I need to contact someone else to get this information Thanks Lesli Forwarded by Lesli CampbellHOUECT on PM From Tanya Rohauer PM To Lesli CT cc Subject Valero Valero Gas Marketing LP assigned its master swap contract to Valero Marketing Supply before its merger with PGE according to legal CAS does not reflect the assignment it shows that the master is still with Valero Gas Marketing which is now PGE Texas VGM Can you get a copy of the assignment from Tana Jones and get the master moved within credit aggregation the trades are in the right place Thanks Tanya

Original GuaranteesI have talked with everyone involved Anthony Campos Mark Thorne etc and everyone is in agreement that original guarantees should now come to credit If you could please just make sure that they come to my attention so that they can be briefed and entered into our Credit Agg System If you have any questions please give me a call Thanks Lesli Forwarded by Lesli CampbellHOUECT on AM From Tanya Rohauer AM To Lesli CT cc Subject Original Guarantees This is what we discussed a few weeks ago Forwarded by Tanya RohauerHOUECT on AM From Tana Jones on AM To William S CT Debbie R CT Tanya CT cc Subject Original Guarantees Just a followup note We are still unclear as to whether we should continue to send original incoming and outgoing guarantees to Global Contracts which is what we have been doing for about years since the Corp Secretary kicked us out of using their vault on for originals because we had too many documents I think it would be good practice if Legal and Credit sent the originals to the same place so we will be able to find them when we want them So my question to yall is do you think we should send them to Global Contracts to you or directly the the th floor vault if they let us
